title: OneRepublic - Dreaming Out Loud [2008][CD+2 Videos+Cov]
description:
ONEREPUBLIC - DREAMING OUT LOUD, album released UK March 10th 2008.
Encoded 192Kbps [Lame] mp3. - 2 Music Videos & CD Covers included.

OneRepublic is an American pop rock band formed in Colorado Springs. They have drawn mainstream attention since the release of their hit single, &#039;Apologize&#039; in 2007. Since the summer of 2006, OneRepublic has consistently been ranked as one of the top musical acts on MySpace, due to high exposure within the online community. They were started by songwriter and record producer Ryan Tedder and his high school friend Zach Filkins in Colorado Springs. The group solidified in 2003 with Tedder, Filkins, Drew Brown, Eddie Fisher, and Tim Myers in Los Angeles. After signing a deal with Columbia Records they entered the studio in the summer of 2005 with producer Greg Wells [Mika, Rufus Wainwright, Deftones] with two songs produced by lead singer Ryan Tedder. After a brief stint on Columbia, they moved to Interscope Records/Mosley Music Group. Tim Myers left the group in 2007 and Brent Kutzle replaced him.

&#039;Dreaming Out Loud&#039; is the debut album by OneRepublic. The album was originally released on November 20th 2007 in the U.S.A., though many of the tracks were leaked months in advance of the official release date. The album follows 2 years of massive success on MySpace where the band have appeared in MySpace Music&#039;s Top Artists since early 2006, with over 24 million total song plays counted. It has so far been released in US, Australia and New Zealand and was released in the UK on March 10th 2008. The album has currently sold 1 million albums world wide. The first single to be lifted from the album was &#039;Apologize&#039; [both in its original form and a version remixed by Timbaland]. The follow up single &#039;Stop and Stare&#039; was released on March 3rd in the United Kingdom.
At the time of writing [March 17th 2008] the album is at No.2 in the official UK Album Chart.
